name: Oni Zon
description:
Japan, 80's. Six university students decided to conduct a "test of courage" in a bankrupt oil company in the past decade. A bad idea, that brings unimaginable problems. Do you have the courage to go all the way and know what happens ? a short horror game where you have few tools at hand to solve many problems. Please, read the Disclaimer and "Read Me" file. Thanx !
Language: English
